name: hygger Sponge Filter, Aquarium Filter Double Sponge Replaceable Media with 4 Biochemical Sponges and 1 Bag of Filtered Ceramic Balls Ultra Quiet Filter Fish Tank (S/M) (M for 15 to 55 Gallon Tank)
short_description: Biochemical Filtration: With an air pump as the power source, combined with mechanical filtration, the principle of biological filtration utilizes multi-level filtration to produce good things, and the sponge can absorb fine particles to achieve the effect of purifying water. The water flow is controlled by the airflow, which is small and slow and does not impact the fish

Changeable filter material: Two kinds of replaceable filter materials: sponge + ceramic filter balls. You can easily remove sponges from the filter for cleaning or replacement, with a total of 4 sponges. It also has 2 media boxes with ceramic filters to help eliminate bad things and provide additional cleaning, or use other filters media

Easy to use: Use a 4mm air hose to connect the end to the air pump and the other end to this tank filter. The outlet pipe in the sponge filter can be adjusted so that you can change the direction and height of the water flow (not including the pump and air hose, please choose a powerful pump for this filter according to your tank size)

Upgrade filter: Aquarium filter can increase the amount of water dissolved, ultra-quiet, not easy to block, can be installed with filter material. Multi-layer design of filter cotton, with a large surface area, full filtration without dead ends. The suction cup is strong and secure. The bottom direction is 360 degrees rotatable

Suitable Size: The medium sponge filter is 6.3 inch width and 9 inch to 13 inch height, the sponge inside circle diameter is 0.59 inch, suggest for 15 to 55 gallon fish tank. For larger tank you may need 2 of this filter. Suitable for shrimp tanks, betta fish tanks, breeding ponds, goldfish, discus, crayfish, deep-fresh fish, juvenile fish or other fish

name: HOB Slim Aquarium Filter for Up to 5 Gallon Tank Ultra-Quiet Fish Tank Power Filter Flow Adjustable Suitable for Saltwater and Freshwater 42 GPH 3W
short_description: 【Novique HOB Aquarium Filter】: Still worried about traditional filters being too bulky and unsightly, or the strong water flow putting pressure on organisms? Don't worry, Novique addresses these concerns with its five core advantages.It features a slim design; runs quietly ; has adjustable flow to suit aquatic life; features triple filtration to protect water quality; and has a waterfall design for efficient oxygenation. Choose Novique and enjoy the fun of aquarium maintenance with ease.

【Slim and Quiet】: Novique fish tank filters, with their slim and compact form, can easily fit into nano and Pico aquariums under 5 gallons, effectively saving space while precisely fitting frames or glass up to 0.28 inches thick. With an external motor design, it reduces noise interference from the source, keeping operational noise strictly below 40 decibels，far quieter than everyday conversation, allowing you to enjoy a serene environment. It is an ideal choice for small aquarium enthusiasts.

【Adjustable Flow Rate】: Novique's adjustable flow design is customized to meet the needs of different organisms: by controlling the valve, the water flow can be regulated without affecting the filtration efficiency, meeting the low flow requirements of betta fish, shrimp, plants, etc. For delicate fish such as tigerfish and goldfish, gentle water flow can prevent them from experiencing excessive pressure due to strong current (such as difficulty in swimming or avoiding certain areas, etc).

【Triple Filtration】: Novique filter plate integrates ultra-dense mesh filter cotton and activated carbon to form a highly efficient filtration core. The filter cotton enhances mechanical filtration to capture particle debris. Activated carbon simultaneously adsorbs toxins, odors and discoloration. Combined with a sponge biological filter at the water inlet to prevent small fish and shrimp from accidentally sucked in and purifies harmful substances. Triple protection ensures clean water quality.

【Efficient Oxygenation & No Worry After Sale】: The unique waterfall design synchronizes filtration and oxygenation to promote fish health and activity. Comes with a complete set of accessories for easy installation. Before starting, fill the filter with water . The minimum water level in the aquarium should not be less than 1 inch below the edge of the fish tank. We offer a 12-month warranty and 24-hour professional after-sales service. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
【Replacement Filter】: For replacement filter cartridges for this aquarium filter, please search for "B0FXG9Q1CY".
product_description: Novique, is committed to providing professional, high quality products for every aquarium hobbyist. Product Parameters： Wattage: 3 watts Voltage: AC 110V 60Hz Max Output: 42 GPH Fits Aquariums: Up to 5 Gallon Installation: External Applicable aquarium Thickness: No more than 0.24 in Scope Of Application: Freshwater and saltwater fish tank Cautions: 1. Before starting, fill the filter with water . 2. The minimum water level in the aquarium should not be less than 1 inch below the edge of the fish tank. 3. The filter cotton is easy to remove and replace. It is recommended to replace the filter cotton every month. 4. Flexibly adjust the bottom adjustment wheel to help the filter remain parallel to the water surface and avoid overflowing due to excessive tilt. Combined with a sponge biological filter at the water inlet to prevent small fish and shrimp from accidentally sucked in and purifies harmful substances. 5. Quality Services: We offer a 12-month warranty and 24-hour professional after-sales service, always ready to respond to your needs. Novique, always innovating for a better life. short_description: Fine Sponge Filtration: Provide mechanical and biological filtration and trap debris or wastes without sucking up shrimp or fry. Keep fish tanks crystal clear and healthy.
80 GPH Water Pump: 2 types of water outlets (drenching pipe & spraying pipe). Slide the knob to freely adjust water flow as needed. Greatly promote water circulation to keep water fresh.
For 10 Gal Tanks: Size: 1.6" W x 5.3" H; Power: 4 W. Fit for 10-20 gallon small fish tanks. Suitable for the breeding and feeding of various ornamental fish, shrimp or fry.
Oxygen Supplement: Equipped with clear airline tubing for easy air entry. Produce numerous bubbles – a great way to increase oxygen solubility in the water and enliven the aquatic lives.

Easy to Clean: Separate the pump from the filter, remove the impeller cover and clean the pump thoroughly. Remove the bottom cover to take out the sponge. Rinse the sponge every 2 weeks – only wash it with aquarium water!

name: SEAOURA Aquarium Filter，Small Internal Aquarium Filter ， Aquarium Quiet Electric Filter for 5-15 Gallon Aquariums，Aeration System 100GPH Water Pump
short_description: {Double Filter: Physical Filtration+Biochemical Filtration} High quality biochemical cotton adopts ribbed design, increasing surface area and filtering out absorbed feces, debris, and residues in water. Bioceramic media balls improve filtration efficiency and can quickly purify water quality. Ceramic balls can also be replaced with other filtering materials.

{Multi function fish filter} The filter has 2 ways of water discharge, a rain shower outlet pipe and an aeration outlet. The rain shower outlet pipe can let the water flow out like a waterfall, with good filtering effect, and allows a small amount of oxygen to enter the fish tank. The oxygenation outlet can Increase oxygen and adjust the oxygenation amount.

{Silent operation} Say goodbye to noisy filtering systems. Our aquarium filters operate silently, ensuring a peaceful and stress free environment for you and your aquatic companion（There may be a slight oxygen spray sound when using the oxygen spray function）

{Easy to use} All components of this filter are detachable, and you can easily assemble them together. With three powerful suction cups, you can firmly fix the filter in any underwater water tank position without floating.

{Installation Precautions}The filter is 1.2 inches away from the water surface, and the oxygen spraying effect is the best, which can spray a large amount of oxygen.If the filter is 1.2 inches or lower than the water surface, it will lead to a decrease in oxygen injection, or even the inability to spray oxygen. Reduce to the point where oxygen cannot be sprayed and only allow for water circulation.

name: Tetra Whisper IQ Power Filter 45 Gallons, 215 GPH, With Stay Clean Technology
short_description: QUIET AQUARIUM FILTER: The Tetra Whisper IQ Power Filter with Stay Clean technology contains a sound shield for quiet filtration less than 40 dB.
SELF PRIMING: Submerged motor starts up with no priming required.
CAPACITY: The Tetra Whisper IQ 45 Power Filter works in filters up to 45 gallons (215 GPH).
STAY CLEAN TECHNOLOGY: By maintaining healthy pH levels, creates easier maintenance for healthier fish.
CARTRIDGE REFILLS: Change cartridges monthly; uses large-sized Tetra Whisper Bio-Bag Filter Cartridges (refills sold separately).
product_description: The Tetra® Whisper® IQ Power Filter with Stay Clean™ technology keeps aquarium water clean and clear. This quiet filter contains a soft barrier between the motor and the filter that serves as a sound shield to minimize noise. The bio-scrubber cultivates aerobic bacteria to remove toxic ammonia and nitrite, and the smart path spillway oxygenates the water and agitates the surface. With a self-priming, submerged motor and adjustable intake to fit your aquarium’s needs, the Tetra Whisper IQ Power Filter is perfect for use with both freshwater and marine fish. Works with easy-to-change Tetra Whisper Bio-Bag® Filter Cartridges with Stay Clean technology – helps reduce buildup on aquarium glass, bind small dirt particles to make them easier to filter and stabilize pH levels to prevent crashes, meaning easier aquarium maintenance for you. Tetra Whisper IQ Power Filters are available in a range of sizes to fit your aquarium. This Tetra Whisper IQ 45 Power Filter treats aquariums up to 45 gallons (215 GPH). Convenient color coding makes it simple to choose the correct size replacement cartridge – use with size large Tetra Whisper Bio-Bag Filter Cartridges (blue packaging). Since 1951, Tetra has developed the world’s most comprehensive body of fish food knowledge, and fishkeeping enthusiasts have looked to the brand for products and solutions that add ease and beauty to their home. Whether you're an experienced hobbyist or just starting out, Tetra has everything you need – from a large variety of quality fish food and innovative equipment to test kits and decor.

But DaToo filter help you easily implement it. Strong horse-power, Waterfall type water flow, perfect work in 24 hours ensures a clean and healthy water environment. Now follow me to get to know DaToo Aquarium Filter. Let's Go!!

POWERFUL FILTERING: In the process of raising fish, due to feeding and fish excretion, our fish tank will inevitably produce some harmful impurities and odor. DaToo Filter uses enhanced filter Cartridge with activated carbon, can effectively absorb harmful impurities in the water and remove odors from the tank. Large filter space, extra filter materials can be added as needed, such as biochemical ball, carbon bag, etc. Filtration capacity than similar products increased by 2 to 3 times.

Select DaToo Filter, Let us say goodbye to noise。

Long-term use does not produce toxins, safe for you and your lovely fish. Super energy efficient design, only consume 2KWH of electricity per month.Select DaToo Aquarium Filter, not only cares for your fish health, but also saves your electricity bill.

name: Marineland Penguin Bio-Wheel Power Filter, Multi-Stage Aquarium Filtration
short_description: WITH ROTATING BIO-WHEEL: Patented Bio-Wheel technology provides excellent wet/dry biological filtration.
MULTI-STAGE FILTRATION: Delivers mechanical, chemical and biological aquarium filtration to maintain a clean aquatic environment.
MARINELAND FILTRATION PRODUCTS: Count on Marineland brand for the most reliable, technically advanced aquariums and accessories on the market.
COMPATIBILITY: Use with Marineland Rite-Size Filter Cartridges (see individual filter for sizing recommendations).
FIVE SIZES: Available in 75 GPH, 100 GPH, 150 GPH, 200 GPH and 350 GPH sizes.
product_description: Marineland® brand is the world’s leading brand of innovative equipment and environments for consumers wishing to create the ultimate aquatic showcase. Committed to fishkeeping success for over 40 years, the brand is the professional’s choice for commercial display systems and scientific research. Whatever you’re passionate about – freshwater or saltwater, big or small, beauty or science – make your aquarium your own. Marineland® Penguin® Bio-Wheel® Power Filter delivers easy, three-stage mechanical, chemical and biological aquarium filtration. This powerful filter contains patented rotating Bio-Wheel® technology to provide superior wet/dry biological filtration for nitrifying bacteria growth and eliminating toxic ammonia and nitrate fast. As it rotates, the Bio-Wheel exposes beneficial bacteria to the air, helping bacteria work harder and faster to keep your aquarium ammonia-free. The Bio-Wheel never clogs or needs to be replaced. All Bio-Wheel filters feature noise-reducing, two-piece vented covers and adjustable mid-level intake strainers. Uses Marineland Rite-Size™ Filter Cartridges with Black Diamond® Premium Activated Carbon to filter out dirt and debris for maximum water clarity. Available in five sizes: 75 GPH (for aquariums up to 10 gallons); 100 GPH (for aquariums up to 20 gallons); 150 GPH (for aquariums up to 30 gallons); 200 GPH (for aquariums up to 50 gallons); 350 GPH (for aquariums up to 70 gallons). Clean, sparkling water is the mark of a healthy, thriving aquarium. The amount of filtration needed to maintain an aquarium depends on a number of variables. These include tank size, individual maintenance habits and fish population. Whatever your individual needs, Marineland brand has the filtration products you need to deliver on-target, advanced filtration.

name: AquaMiracle Aquarium Filter 3-Stage in-Tank Filter Internal Fish Tank Filter Turtle Filter for 10-40 Gallon Fish Tanks with Dual Water Outlet & Aeration
short_description: PERFORMANCE – Max. Flow 130GPH (500L/H), Max lift 2.5ft (0.76m), Power 3.5W. This fish filter is ideal for fish tank size of 10-40 gallons(Choose the right filter for your tank). A filter can’t cover tanks of big differences in capacity (as claimed by some products online)! Follow our recommendations for your tank.
SAFETY – The aquarium filter is fully submersible with epoxy sealed motor. Each fish tank filter has been submerged in water and tested with super high voltage to ensure the safety.

3-STAGE FILTRATION – 3 sponge blocks – coarse sponge, carbonized sponge and fine sponge provide 3-stage filtration. COARSE SPONGE filters out large size impurities such as food residue, fish excrements, plant leaves etc.; CARBONIZED SPONGE removes odor, chlorine and fine particles; FINE SPONGE polishes water before it goes back to tank. PLUS the transparent box makes it easy to check the filtering material when they get dirty. Search code “B09W23YJD7” for the replacement sponges.

AERATING WATER - Oxygenation is very important to your fish. Different from most of the filters in the market, this turtle tank filter also provides an air venturi and air tubing to increase oxygen supply in your fish tank.

KIND REMINDER – If your tank is very large, choose 2 filters! Place a filter at both the left and right corners at the back side. You will get full filtration and great water circulation in your tank! PLUS this filter is with dual water outlet to ensure even water distribution in your fish tank!

name: AQQA Quiet 20-30 Gallon Fish Tank Filters - Auto Start Hang on Back Aquarium Filter, 6W/ 8W Adjustable Flow, Deodorization Decontamination Filter System AQ168 (6W 158GPH)
short_description: PLUG-AND-PLAY - The AQQA aquarium filter is designed for ultimate ease of use. Unlike many traditional filters that require water to be added before starting, our fish tank filter can be powered on directly—no need to fill with water! Simply plug it in, and the filter will start working immediately, making setup quick and hassle-free. Suitable for fish tank with a thickness of up to 1.2 inches (28mm). (Note: When in use, the water pump should be below the water surface)

CUSTOMIZABLE WATER FLOW - Our filter for fish tank features an adjustable flow control system, allowing you to effortlessly fine-tune the water flow to match the needs of your tank's inhabitants. Whether you have delicate fish that prefer calm waters or species that thrive in stronger currents, our aquarium filter offers the flexibility to create the perfect environment

TRIPLE BIO SPONGES FOR EFFICIENT FILTRATION - Our fish tank filter provides superior filtration to maintain a pristine and healthy aquarium environment. Its innovative design, featuring triple bio sponges, contains activated carbon, ensures both mechanical and biological filtration. This allows the filter to effectively trap debris and waste, helping to keep the water clean and clear

ULTRA QUIET OPERATION - One of the standout features of our fish filters for aquariums is its ultra-quiet operation. Designed with advanced noise reduction technology, this small aquarium filter runs at a barely audible level, making it perfect for bedrooms, offices, or any space where noise is a concern. With noise levels kept below 30 dB, you can enjoy a peaceful environment without disturbing either your aquatic pets or your household

SPACE-SAVING & ULTRA-THIN - This silent fish tank filter is compact, efficient, and ultra-thin, designed to save valuable space in your aquarium setup. Its Hang-On-Back (HOB) installation method offers a convenient solution for tanks from 20 to 30 gallons. The sleek design blends seamlessly with your tank’s appearance, delivering high performance without being intrusive

24/7 SUPPORT - Our filters are backed by a 2-year warranty. If you experience any issues upon receiving the product, please reach out to our customer service team right away. We are committed to resolving your concerns as quickly as possible
